statements: SELECT * FROM advocacy_group;
SELECT issue_title, legislative_outcome FROM advocacy_group WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group WHERE id = 2;
SELECT issue_description FROM advocacy_group WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, issue_title FROM advocacy_group WHERE legislative_outcome = 'Passed';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group WHERE id = 1;
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM advocacy_group WHERE legislative_outcome = 'Passed';
SELECT id, issue_description, legislative_outcome FROM advocacy_group WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY legislative_outcome ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group WHERE issue_title LIKE '%education%' AND legislative_outcome = 'In Progress';
SELECT issue_title, issue_description, legislative_outcome FROM advocacy_group WHERE issue_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group;
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT group_name, group_id FROM advocacy_group ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT policy_title FROM policy_data WHERE legislative_outcome = 'passed';
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group JOIN policy_data ON advocacy_group.group_id = policy_data.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT group_id, group_name FROM advocacy_group ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT policy_title, legislative_outcome FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group JOIN policy_data ON advocacy_group.group_id = policy_data.policy_id;
SELECT group_id, group_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Policies FROM advocacy_group JOIN policy_data ON advocacy_group.group_id = policy_data.policy_id GROUP BY group_id ORDER BY Total_Policies DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_issues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_status FROM policy_issues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM legislative_outcomes ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_size FROM advocacy_group WHERE group_size > 100;
SELECT * FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_status = TRUE;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM legislative_outcomes ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_size FROM advocacy_group WHERE group_size > 100;
SELECT issue_name, outcome_date FROM policy_issues JOIN legislative_outcomes ON policy_issues.issue_id = legislative_outcomes.issue_id;
SELECT * FROM PolicyIssues WHERE issue_id = 1;
SELECT issue_title FROM PolicyIssues WHERE issue_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyGroups ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_location FROM AdvocacyGroups WHERE group_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM GroupActivities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date;
SELECT * FROM PolicyIssues;
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM PolicyIssues;
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyGroups WHERE group_location = 'New York';
SELECT g.group_name, a.activity_date FROM AdvocacyGroups g JOIN GroupActivities a ON g.group_id = a.group_id;
SELECT * FROM LegislativeOutcomes WHERE outcome_id > 5 ORDER BY outcome_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group;
SELECT group_name, group_location FROM advocacy_group;
SELECT issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_category='Healthcare';

SELECT group_name, issue_description FROM advocacy_group JOIN group_policy_relationship ON advocacy_group.group_id = group_policy_relationship.group_id JOIN policy_issues ON group_policy_relationship.issue_id = policy_issues.issue_id;
SELECT group_id, COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM group_policy_relationship GROUP BY group_id ORDER BY total_issues DESC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_group WHERE group_location = 'New York';
SELECT group_name, group_location FROM advocacy_group ORDER BY group_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_category = 'Healthcare' LIMIT 5;

SELECT group_name, issue_description, outcome_status FROM advocacy_group JOIN group_policy_relationship ON advocacy_group.group_id = group_policy_relationship.group_id JOIN policy_issues ON group_policy_relationship.issue_id = policy_issues.issue_id JOIN outcome_relationship ON policy_issues.issue_id = outcome_relationship.issue_id JOIN legislative_outcomes ON outcome_relationship.outcome_id = legislative_outcomes.outcome_id;

SELECT group_name, issue_category, outcome_description FROM advocacy_group JOIN group_policy_relationship ON advocacy_group.group_id = group_policy_relationship.group_id JOIN policy_issues ON group_policy_relationship.issue_id = policy_issues.issue_id JOIN outcome_relationship ON policy_issues.issue_id = outcome_relationship.issue_id JOIN legislative_outcomes ON outcome_relationship.outcome_id = legislative_outcomes.outcome_id WHERE outcome_status = 'Passed';
